mapper.select: SELECT l.type, m.nickname, CASE WHEN l.type = 'H' THEN h.place_title WHEN l.type = 'A' THEN a.title WHEN l.type = 'P' THEN p.title END AS title FROM tb_like l INNER JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN hot_place_board h ON l.type = 'H' AND l.item_id = h.id LEFT JOIN attraction_info a ON l.type = 'A' AND l.item_id = a.content_id LEFT JOIN travel_plan p ON l.type = 'P' AND l.item_id = p.travle_plan_id WHERE m.nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT h.*, m.nickname FROM hot_place_board h, member m WHERE h.member_id=m.member_id AND m.email=#{email}
